alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 1:04PM EST until January 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Southern Litchfield County in northwestern Connecticut and the mid-Hudson Valley and southern Taconics in eastern New York. * WHEN...Through 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening or Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation is expected to begin this afternoon and transition to light snow by tonight. Precipitation will then transition back to a wintry mix and then plain rain Wednesday morning as temperatures rise above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess
